item.title: Blog Guideline
item.description: In the beginning, I supposed that I’m the only one who write-up thing in this blog. But now thing was change, this blog might have multiple bloggers. So it needs a guideline to describe how to contribute. 1. How to submit a new content Here is the source repo. Fork it & start writing. Create a pull request to submit your content. Make sure to create your author page. 2.
